Schedule

  • Content (): contain links to the readings for each week. Read these before class. Lecture slide decks will also appear here.

  • Assignment (): contain the instructions for each assignment. Due dates and submission links will appear on Canvas.

Topic Content Assignment
Week 01 Jan 9 / Jan 11 Hello + what are civil wars?
Week 02 Jan 16 / Jan 18 Why do people rebel? Grievances, ethnicity
Week 03 Jan 23 / Jan 25 Why do people rebel? Resources
Week 04 Jan 30 / Feb 1 How are wars fought? Insurgency
Week 05 Feb 6 / Feb 8 Midterm exam on Feb 6th + in-class film
Week 06 Feb 13 / Feb 15 How are wars fought? Counterinsurgency
Week 07 Feb 20 / Feb 22 Case study: forced displacement in Colombia
Week 08 Feb 27 / Feb 29 Case study: civilian resistance in Peru
Week 09 Mar 5 / Mar 7 Case study: ethnic conflict in Ethiopia
Week 10 Mar 12 / Mar 14 How do wars end? Negotiated settlements
Mar 21 Final exam at 3:30pm
